alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; McPherson; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 2:36PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of McPherson, northeastern Rice, eastern Ellsworth and Saline Counties through 315 PM CST... At 235 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Windom to near Moundridge. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Moundridge, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Assaria, Gypsum, Brookville, Smolan, Windom, Falun, Salina Airport, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury, Bridgeport, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 43 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
